head: Gorgeous Remodeled 1 Bed one Bath Flat.
post: 2020 California St Gorgeous remodeled one bedroom, one bath flat in Pacific Heights. This charming unit has a tile floor and is on the garden level in a historic Victorian Mansion. The kitchen includes all the amenities. Southern exposure ensures that brightness is one of the nice features of this property. Contemporary furnishings and recessed lighting add to the ambience. Washer and dryer in unit. Well equipped with high speed internet and bi-monthly housecleaning services provided with no additional charges. This flat is part of a beautiful Victorian complex. Located with easy access to public transportation. Minimums/Terms/Rates. . . All appliances are newer and in good working condition. Kitchen appliances are stainless steel.

head: 2bed 2bath (Duboce Triangle)
post: A rare opportunity to own or rent a fabulous house-like condominium on one of the most desirable streets in the City, conveniently located to shopping, great restaurants, markets, popular Duboce and Buena Vista Parks, Downtown and transportation. A sought after Victorian home in move-in condition with views across the City toward the East Bay. Beautifully maintained, professionally remodeled and updated with elegant attention to detail, this extraordinary and versatile 2-bedroom, 2 bath home offers a living room, formal dining room, home office, crown moldings and hardwood floors, a remodeled, eat-in kitchen with laundry center, operable skylight and adjacent, walk-out deck, among other exceptional features. The same custom designed deck wraps around to the rear of the property creating a peaceful and intimate environment, which is ideal for relaxation and entertaining. From the master suite you can enjoy breathtaking sunrises, easterly views across the City, visits from hummingbirds and songbirds, and frequent sightings of soaring red tailed hawks and San Franciscos famous parrots. It is the perfect place to begin and end the day. Remodeled and updated with great attention to detail Luxurious, updated, MOVE-IN condition Wonderful curb appeal -- So VERY San Francisco Period details include marble fireplace surround, box beam ceilings, bevel glass window, decorative rosettes, crown moldings and vintage pocket doors Designer specified paint throughout Living room with marble fireplace Formal dining room 11+ ceilings in most rooms Remodeled eat in kitchen with custom cabinetry, top quality appliances, plenty of storage, recessed lighting, operable skylight, and walk out deck Lovely, light-filled, remodeled view master suite with custom closet and French doors opening to adjacent private deck with wonderful San Francisco and East Bay views Remodeled, light-filled master bathroom Remodeled marble guest bathroom Recently added home office with custom cabinetry and lighting Hardwood flooring in most rooms New Baldwin bronze hardware throughout Professionally designed closet systems throughout Built in sound system with ceiling speakers in main rooms including kitchen Laundry center in Kitchen Deeded custom designed wrap around deck with access from kitchen and master suite Views of San Francisco and East Bay from master suite and adjacent deck DEEDED GARAGE with parking for one car and ample, custom designed California Closets storage Exclusive use and development rights to the roof PRETTY DUBOCE and BUENA VISTA PARKS WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE Beaver Street is a serene, tree-lined street yet is steps to the urban delights of Noe Valley/Castro Village including grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, boutique shops and banks. Convenient to many transportation options including 280 and 101 to and Tech Buses. Muni and Market Street historic Streetcars are a short distance away for Downtown, Financial District and Union Square commutes. With a Walk Score of 100-a walkers paradise, a Transit Score 96-Riders Paradise and a Bikers Score 86-Very Bikeable, this location is a perfect point to explore all San Francisco has to offer.

head: Renovated 2 bedroom plus parking
post: Spacious 2 bedroom in quiet area. Newly renovated. Close to all amneties and transit. Brand new carpet and laminate flooring. Includes fridge and stove. Smoke free building. Heat and Hydro included. Available as soon as possible or July 1st.

head: Neewly renovated one bedroom apartment for rent
post: Take the 45 Bus to downtown in 20 minutes! Walk to the trendy shops, cafes, restaurants and coffee shops on Union Street -- Roses for breakfast, lunch or dinner. From lavish meals to pizza, everything is right outside your doorstep. Take a short walk to Chestnut St in the Marina, too SAN JOSE 673 South 10th street at Reed Street The unit is a Triplex complex; meaning that there are 3 houses located on the property.The one that is currently available to rent is a one bedroom unit. The property has its own private entrances (a front entrance that leads to a porch and a back entrance that leads to the backyard. The house has its own private: kitchen, bathroom, living room, the bedroom itself and one garage port. Garbage utility bill included. Rent is $600 and Deposit is $350. It is located next to 2 elementary schools, 3 laundromats,,3 blocks from San jose State University, 3 blocks from 280 Freeway, Major grocery stores,10th street Ice rink, restaurants.... close to all of the sj downtown amenities. We are looking to have it rent out as soon as possible. The House is ready to be showed so just give us a call to schedule a time. The application is short and will be used to contact you back. Let us Know if interested. and have a great day!

head: Nicely Spacious Family Home
post: Great 4 bedroom 3 bath family home with two-car garage with extra storage. This beautifully maintained home is in like new condition. Hardwood floors throughout. Vinyl in kitchen and bathrooms. Forced air propane heat plus fireplace in living room. Roomy kitchen opens to large deck in back. Bedroom and bath on main level and 3 bedrooms and 2 baths on second story. Basement with washer dryer hook ups. Large sunny yard. Plenty of parking. Great commute location and close to downtown.

head: help a family out
post: If you can help a family call 415-418-4791 The family are down on there luck Shelters are full all they need is a jump start so the can make it Family of five need a place they can call home they dont want a hand out but it can help

head: SJSU Roommate Wanted 1 bd/br
post: I am looking for a girl roommate willing to pay $725 a month plus a security deposit of $500. The apartment is 1 bedroom 1bathroom, fully remodeled, less than a block away from SJSU.Some utilities are included. Trash, Internet and water are included, electricity is not . It is one bedroom so we would have to share, there is also a living room and a kitchen. Of all the apartments I saw it was by far the best, very cozy and safe feeling. It is available July 1st and the leasing can be for 6 months or a year, we can discuss which one is preffered. I will be freshman at SJSU this fall so I would prefer to have an SJSU freshman as well or another SJSU student. Looking for someone clean, respectful, responsible, and friendly. No drugs nor smoking. I would prefer for it just to be 2 people living in the apartment, but a third roommate can be discussed, and the price would lower. I am clean,respectful, responsible, friendly, and outgoing. The faster I find someone the better so please reply to my craigslist mail! Thank you :)

head: Great North Berkeley/Albany Solano Ave Location 1BR Available Now!!
post: If youre looking for a nice and quiet place to live in the heart of Solano Avenue then look no further! Conveniently Located at 1494 Solano in Albany (just three doors down from Safeway), we currently have some of our bright and cozy one bedroom apartments available for move in on July 1st and July 15th. (possibly sooner if you need it before then)! Solano Avenue offers great shopping, dining and entertainment along with a safe neighborhood atmosphere all steps outside of your apartment. This building is only two miles from UC Berkeley and a short distance from several BART stations all of which can be easily accessed by AC Transit line 18 which runs along Solano Avenue. Freeway access is also very quick and easy; this building is in the perfect East Bay location to meet all of your commuting and travel needs. The rent for the apartments range from: $1,175 for third floor unit $1,150 for second floor unit $1,100 for ground floor unit The security deposit is $1,650 Credit checking fee is $25 Water and garbage are included in the rent. Plenty of street parking is available, parking inside the building may also be available for an additional charge added to monthly rent. Sorry, no section 8. There will be an open house for the available apartments this upcoming Wednesday June26th from 5:30pm to 6:30pm. If you wish to attend the open house please RSVP by emailing the manager (1494solanoave@gmail.com) to receive further information. The pictures shown are not the exact apartments currently available, but all of our one bedrooms are identical in size and layout, they just vary slightly in carpets and finishes.

head: Beautiful Cole Valley Apartment for mid August to mid September
post: Our Apartment will be available for short-term sublet from August 20 to September 24. You can rent it by the week or for the entire time for a reduced rate. The Apartment: We are offering our beautiful and sunny 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment located in the heart of San Francisco for you to enjoy. Our place is fully stocked with high-speed internet, HD TV with basic cable and surround sound, queen bed, and a full kitchen featuring gas appliances and an espresso machine. Location and Transportation: Our apartment is located in the Cole Valley neighborhood of San Francisco. There are 2 bus lines right outside, and the MUNI light rail within an easy 3 block stroll. Public transit gives you great access to the beach, downtown, and all of the major attractions in San Francisco without the stress of city driving or parking. $800 per week or $2800 for the month
